probability: Measure of the likelihood that an event will occur
sample space: The set of all possible outcomes of a probability experiment
event: A set of outcomes to which a probability is assigned
outcome: A possible result of a probability experiment
average: Sum of values divided by number of values
random experiment: A process where the outcome is not known until it is observed
impossible: An event with no chance of occurring
random: Governed by or involving equal chances for each item
